projects.name: Wealth SaGa
achievements: Wealth SaGa is an edTech platform where users can learn about Indian Stock Market
Tech Stack         : React Native, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS EC2, AWS ECR, AWS Amplify, Paytm Payments Gateway, Material UI v4 (for admin panel), Winston, firebase cloud-messaging
Supported Platform : Android
My Contribution    : built from scratch except AWS Deployment

projects.name: TM Profile Tree
achievements: TM Profile Tree provides Digital Business Cards for Entrepreneurs and Marketers to help them stay connected online
Tech Stack         : React, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS EC2, AWS ECR, AWS Amplify, Razorpay, Material UI v5 (for admin panel), Winston, Redux SaGa
Supported Platform : Web
My Contribution    : built from scratch except AWS Deployment
Status             : Under Development

projects.name: In Memory Of You
achievements: A Social Media Platform to organize funeral Events
Supported Platform : Web
My Contribution    : Developing frontend components

projects.name: Hostbidable
achievements: Hostbidable is an online property bidding platform where the property owner can sell their property to an appropriate buyer via auction hosted by some host
Tech Stack         : Javascript,React Native, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS, Stripe Gateway, React Native Paper (for App UI), React Strap (for admin panel)
Supported Platform : Android and IOS
My Contribution    : Application Frontend from scratch

projects.name: Martcues
achievements: An E-commerce platform where users can buy all types of products including food items
Tech Stack         : Javascript, React Native, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS, Rayzorpay Gateway, Ant Design (for admin panel), Winston
Supported Platform : Android
My Contribution    : Mobile App Frontend from scratch

projects.name: Ordio
achievements: A NextJS website with a support of internationalization
Tech Stack         : Javascript, React JS, Next JS, Bootstrap
Supported Platform : Web
My Contribution    : testing code and resolve errors

projects.name: Recrugenie
achievements: MERN Stack Website similar to quikr, where users can book professionals like plumber, electrician etc.
Tech Stack         : Javascript, React JS, Node JS, Express
Supported Platform : Web
My Contribution    : Fixing bugs and adding new features in already deployed website

wordExperience.companyDescription: AI - Driven Adaptive Maths Practice Platform
responsibilities: Work with product managers and UI/UX designers to bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides.
Translate the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code and thus develop and ship new user-facing features.
Take responsibility for code quality, performance and robustness.
Equip implementations for tracking applications such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, hotjar and others.

wordExperience.companyDescription: Octify Technologies is a service based start-up.
responsibilities: Managing team as a Team Leader, ongoing projects as a Team Lead and handling clients
Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and web applications
Development and integration of UX and UI designs that maximize user experience and application usability that matches wireframes
Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code

education.institute: Govt Boys Ser Sec School , CBSE
